Question.Subject: I got a new computer. How do I get my iTunes music back?
Question.Content: I just got a new computer. I had a bunch of songs on iTunes that I had purchased over the last few years. My old comp. died, so there is no retrieving there. Is there any way to get my purchased music back?
Question.ChosenAnswer: if music on you ipod/iphone/itouch , you can get it all back. try this one: http://www.isharesoft.com/ipod-transfer.html it can copy all the music from ipod/iphone/itouch to local pc. so you do not need your old computer. hope it helps for you

Answer.Content: if music on you ipod/iphone/itouch , you can get it all back. try this one: http://www.isharesoft.com/ipod-transfer.html it can copy all the music from ipod/iphone/itouch to local pc. so you do not need your old computer. hope it helps for you
